related_questions.question:
Monkey and crocodile    one day a monkey wanted to cross a river. he saw a crocodile in the river, so he asked the crocodile to take him across the other side. the crocodile told the monkey to jump on its back. then the crocodile swam down the river.
now, the crocodile was very hungry, so when it was in the middle of the river, it stopped and said to the monkey, "monkey, my father is very sick. he must eat the heart of the monkey. then he will be strong again."
the monkey thought for a while. then he told the crocodile to swim back to the river bank.
"what’s for?" asked the crocodile.
"because i didn’t bring my heart with me," said the monkey. "i left it under the tree, near some coconuts."
so, the crocodile turned around and swam back to the bank of the river. as soon as they reached the river bank, the monkey jumped off the crocodile’s back and climbed up to the top of a tree.
"where is your heart?" asked the crocodile.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Monyet dan buaya

suatu hari monyet ingin menyeberangi sungai. dia melihat buaya di sungai, jadi dia meminta buaya untuk membawanya ke seberang. buaya menyuruh monyet untuk melompat di atasnya

related_questions.question: How did you say to compare animal

For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

Maaf kalau ada yang salah dalam penyampaian kata²nya, apabila ada yang salah dalam jawabannya bisa dikoreksi yaa, semoga membantu ! <3

—Miranthi P.
